original_text: If you obey what I have told you, you will be living in my love. In the same way, I have obeyed what my Father has told me to do. In that way, I live in his love.
korean_text: 내가 아버지의 계명을 지켜 그의 사랑 안에 거하는 것 같이 너희도 내 계명을 지키면 내 사랑 안에 거하리라

sentences.original_text: If you obey what I have told you
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 내가 말한 것을 순종하면

sentences.original_text: you will be living in my love
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내 사랑 안에 살게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I have obeyed what my Father has told me to do
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 아버지께서 내가 하라고 말씀하신 것을 순종했습니다
